mapper.select:
select sub.code as main_subject, psub.pre_subject_code as main_pre_subject from linka.fe_subject sub join linka.prerequisite_subjects psub on sub.code = psub.code
AND sub.code = #{subject}

select fp.col_id ,fp.row_id ,fp.code, cps.carrer_path_id,cps.small_category, cps.type, ci.category from linka.fil_position fp join linka.carrer_path_subjects cps on fp.code = cps.subject_code left join linka.carrer_id ci on ci.carrer_path_id = cps.carrer_path_id
AND cps.carrer_path_id = #{carrer_path_id} AND (cps.type = "core" OR (cps.type = "support" AND cps.small_category = #{small_category}))
select fp.*,fs.name,fs.is_mandatory from linka.fil_position fp inner join linka.fe_subject fs on fp.code = fs.code order by fp.row_id, fp.col_id;
select fp.*,fs.name,fs.is_math from linka.fil_position fp inner join linka.fe_subject fs on fp.code = fs.code where fs.is_math = 1 order by fp.row_id, fp.col_id;

select jobs.small_category, ci.carrer_path_id , ci.core_color, ci.support_color from linka.carrer_path jobs inner join linka.carrer_id ci on jobs.large_category = ci.large_category where ci.category = "job"

select majors.small_category, ci.carrer_path_id, ci.core_color, ci.support_color from linka.carrer_path majors inner join linka.carrer_id ci on majors.large_category = ci.large_category where ci.category = "major"

select main.id, main.name, main.code, main. detail, main.semester, main.is_mandatory, main.original_language, main.joint_department,ffs.code as pre_subject_code,ffs.name as pre_subject_name ,sfs.code as relate_subject_code,sfs.name as relate_subject_name from ( select fs.*, jd.joint_department , ps.pre_subject_code , rs.relate_subject_code from linka.fe_subject fs left join linka.joint_departments jd on fs.code = jd.code left join linka.prerequisite_subjects ps on fs.code = ps.code left join linka.relate_subjects rs on fs.code = rs.code) as main left join linka.fe_subject ffs on main.pre_subject_code = ffs.code left join linka.fe_subject sfs on main.relate_subject_code = sfs.code
AND main.code = #{code}
